description.short: Forrest wants to provide a good technological infrastructure for open software development for the Apache Software Foundation based on ASF software, ASF practices and experience and modern software design principles.
description.where: The home page for the xml-forrest project will be found on the web site (http://xml.apache.org/forrest) "when it's ready". There you also find information on how to download the latest release as well as all the other information you might need regarding this project.
description.howto: The documentation available as of the date of this release is included in the "docs/" directory. The documentation sources are in the "src/documentation" directory. Look for the most updated documentation on the web site.
description.licence: For legal and licensing issues, please read the LICENSE.* files in the /legal directory.

credits.credit: This product includes software developed by the Apache Software Foundation (http://www.apache.org/).
